biotools.summary:
Version 2 of the SAMSA pipeline - faster! Lighter! More options! Less waiting!
It is a rapid and efficient metatranscriptome pipeline for analyzing large RNA-seq datasets in a supercomputing cluster environment. It provides simplified output that can be examined directly or used for further analyses, and its reference databases may be upgraded, altered or customized to fit the needs of any experiment.
